sources.title: Cat-Tastrophy (1949)
sources.description: Kitty's owner introduces her to a puppy who will befriend and Kitty realizes that when the puppy grows up he becomes Kitty's enemy because dogs hate cats and makes a chase in the yard at the end of the flashback of kitty for the puppy and kitty chases the puppy and the horse gets into the garbage can. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/cat-tastrophy-1949/
